U

updateAccount(Customer) - Method in class Dao.CustomerDBAccess
This method allows customers to edit thier account as log in
updateCustomer(Customer) - Method in class Dao.CustomerDBManage
This method is used to update a specified customer information in customer databse by admin
updatePassword(String, String) - Method in class Dao.AdminsDBAccess
This method is used to update admin password in database if reset is triggered
updatePassword(String, String) - Method in class Dao.CustomerDBAccess
This method is used to update customer's password if reset is triggered.
updateProduct(Product) - Method in class Dao.ProductDBAccess
This method is used to update a specified product information in product databse by admin
User - Class in Model
This class represents the users including customers, admins who use CoffeeGo web app
User() - Constructor for class Model.User
Constructor: create an User object w/o specified parameters
User(String, String) - Constructor for class Model.User
Constructor: create an User object w/ specified userName, password
User(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class Model.User
Constructor: create an User object w/ specified firstNamw, lastName, userName, password
